arts.ttl: Man United Look to Kickstart Season Against Grimsby Town in Carabao Cup
arts.sum: For Amorim, this match is about more than progression in the Carabao Cup. It represents a chance to calm early doubts, to rotate his squad, and to inject belief into a side that has yet to find rhythm under his guidance. Manchester United will be looking to secure their first victory of the season when they travel to face League Two side Grimsby Town in the Carabao Cup .

arts.ttl: Manchester United XI vs Grimsby Town – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Manchester United travel to face League Two side Grimsby Town on Wednesday night, desperately needing a victory to kick-start their season. After a winless start in the Premier League, this Carabao Cup tie is a crucial opportunity for Rúben Amorim to build confidence, though he is expected to rotate his starting eleven.
